name: openL2CAPChannelSync(_:withPSM:withConfiguration:delegate:)
desc: Opens a new L2CAP channel to the target device. Returns only after the channel is opened.
declaration:
func openL2CAPChannelSync(_ newChannel: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<IOBluetoothL2CAPChannel?>!, 
                  withPSM psm: BluetoothL2CAPPSM, 
        withConfiguration channelConfiguration: [AnyHashable : Any]!, 
                 delegate channelDelegate: Any!) -> IOReturn
